samudra~manthanam.Short Description: Jyeshtha Devi (Kali wife), Varuni (Sesha wife), Sauparni (Garuda wife), Apsaras, Gandharvas, Airavata, Ucchaisrava, Dhanvantari, Parijatam, Kamadhenu born from Milk ocean

zrI~hanUmat~jayantI~2.Short Description: Hanuman born from Kaikeyi part of Payasam taken by Vulture and eaten by Anjana Devi

ta:citrA~paurNamI/citragupta~pUjai.Shloka:
citraguptaM mahAprAjJyaM lekhanIpatradhAriNam .
citraratnAmbaradharaM madhyasthaM sarvadEhinAm ..

akSaya~tRtIyA.Short Description: Daanam of Dadhyodanam, Vyanjanam, Chatram, Paduka, Udaka Kumbham, Mangos, Jackfruit; Lakshmi Narayana Pooja; Gouri Pooja;

rAja-mAtaGgI~jayantI.Short Description: Goddess Raja Matangi is 9th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

sarpa~pUjA~1.Short Description: Vishnu's boon to AdiSesha that humans will worship on this day

gaGgA~saptamI.Short Description: Ganga came out of Jahnu Maharshi and became Jahnavi; perform Parjanya Pooja

zarkarA~saptamI.Short Description: Worship Surya Bhagavan in a vessel (`kumbha`) filled with sugar, followed by `dAnam` of the same.

pUryAM~gOvardhana~maTha~pratiSThApana~ja.Short Description: Adi Shankara founded Govardhan mutt, Puri in Nala year Padmapadacharya as first

kAJcI~kAmakOTi~maTha~pratiSThApana~jayan.Short Description: Adi Shankara founded Kamakoti Mutt, Kanchi in Siddharthi year with himself as first

vaizAkha~pUrNimA~snAnam.Short Description: Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.
vaizAkha~pUrNimA~snAnam.Shloka:
balaM rUpaM yazO dharmaM jJAnamAyuH sukhaM dhRtim .
ArOgyaM paramApnOti samyak snAnEna mAnavaH ..

nArada~jayantI.Short Description: Avataram of `nArada muni`; perform danam of `vINA`, music

karavIra~vratam.Short Description: Perform puja of `karavIra` plants/flowers and then offer them in `arcanA`.
karavIra~vratam.Shloka:
karavIra viSAvAsa namastE bhAnuvallabha.
maulimaNDana durgAdi dEvAnAM satataM priya

rambhA-tRtIyA.Short Description: Rambha Vratam; perform Savitri pooja near Banana tree. Offer naivedyam of bananas prepared with ghee.
rambhA-tRtIyA.Shloka:
puSpamaNDapikA kAryA rambhAstambhOpazObhitA.
tatra sampUjayEddEvIM zaktyA svarNAdinirmitAm ..

vEdESu sarvazAstrESu divi bhUmau rasAtalE.
zrutO dRSTazca bahuzO na zaktyA rahitaH zivaH.
tvaM zakstistvaM svadhA svAhA tvaM sAvitrI sarasvatI.
patiM dEhi sutAndEhi gRhaM dEvi namO'stu tE..

 yOSitaH puruSO vA'pi khyAtaM rambhAvrataM bhuvi.
bhAryAM putraM gRhaM bhOgAn kulavRddhimavApnuyuH..

umA-avatAram.Short Description: Perform puja of Uma-Maheshvara, on the day of Uma Devi's Avataram.
umA-avatAram.Shloka:
jyESThazuklacaturthyAM tu jAtA pUrvamumA satI.
tasmAt sA tatra sampUjyA strIbhiH saubhAgyavRddhayE..

kadalI-gaurI~vratam/pUjA.Short Description: Perform puja of Shiva-Parvati under a banana tree or on a banana leaf, do naivedyam of 100+ bananas and give away to small girl children.
kadalI-gaurI~vratam/pUjA.Shloka:
putrAn dEhi dhanaM dEhi saubhAgyaM sarvamaGgalE.
saumaGgalyaM sukhaM jJAnaM dEhi mE zivasundari..

dazaharA/gaGgAvataraNam/dazapApaharA~daz.Short Description: Avataranam of Ganga Devi. Bathe in any river and offer arghyam — destroys 10 types of sins (`dazaharA`).
dazaharA/gaGgAvataraNam/dazapApaharA~daz.Shloka:
dazamyAM zuklapakSE tu jyESThE mAsE kujE dinE.
gaGgA'vatIrNA hastarkSE sarvapApaharA smRtA..

yAM kAJcit saritaM prApya dadyAdarghyaM zubhOdakam .
mucyatE dazabhiH pApaiH sa mahApAtakOpamaiH..
dazaharA/gaGgAvataraNam/dazapApaharA~daz.Other Names: Ganga Jayanti; Dashapaapa-hara-dashami; Wednesday; Hasta star (Valmiki Ramayana)

gavAmayana~dvAdazI.Short Description: Perform puja of Lord Trivikrama (Sahasranamarchana), do naivedyam of mangoes and offer annadanam to needy.
gavAmayana~dvAdazI.Shloka:
ahOrAtrENa dvAdazyAM jyESThE mAsi trivikramam .
gavAmayanamApnOti apsarObhizca mOdatE..

vaTa~pUrNimA/vaTa-sAvitrI~vratam.Short Description: Perform puja of banyan tree; begets `saumaGgalyam` and `saubhAgyam`.

kumAra~SaSThI~vratam.Short Description: `upavAsam` with only water and next day `pAraNa` gives `Arogyam`
kumAra~SaSThI~vratam.Shloka:
ASADha zuklaSaSThI tu tithiH kaumArilA smRtA.
kumAramarcayEttatra pUrvatrOpESya vai dinam..

SaSThIdEvI~SaSThI~vratam.Short Description: Skanda darshanam is recommended, removes sins including brahmahatya.
SaSThIdEvI~SaSThI~vratam.Shloka:
yO'syAM pazyati gAGgEyaM dakSiNApathavAsinam .
brahmahatyAdi pApaistu mucyatE nAtra saMzayaH ..

subrahmaNya~SaSThI~vratam.Shloka:
sEnAvidAraka skanda mahAsEna mahAbala.
rudrOmAgnija SaDvaktra gaGgAgarbha namO'stu tE..

zAkA-vratam (mahAlakSmI).Short Description: Do danam of leafy vegetables (but do not consume, on this day)

dadhi-vratam (mahAlakSmI).Short Description: Do danam of curd (but do not consume, on this day)

gOpadma~vratam.Shloka:
gOpadmamiti vikhyAtaM sarvapApaharaM param .
sarvaduHkhOpazamanaM sarvasampatpradAyakam .
suvAsinyAstu saubhAgyaputrapautrapravardhanam ..

cAturmAsyavratam~ArambhaH.Short Description: Chaaturmasya begins; 4 months; Pradakshina to Pippala; Deeparadhana in temple; Saraswati Pooja; 1st month no vegetables; 2nd month no curds; 3rd month no milk; 4th month no dals;

guru~pUrNimA/vyAsa~pUjA.Short Description: Puja of Veda Vyasa / Gurus; Danam of Vishnu Puran is good on this day.
guru~pUrNimA/vyAsa~pUjA.Shloka: acaturvadanO brahmA dvibAhuraparO hariH. aphAlalOcanO zambhurbhagavAn bAdArAyaNaH..

kOkila~vratam.Short Description: Pooja of Kokila for getting good husband/wife.

ASADha~pUrNimA~snAnam.Short Description: Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.

azUnyazayana~vratam~1.Short Description: Lord Mahavishnu sleeps with Goddess Mahalakshmi on this day. Do Puja by placing the God/Goddess on a new bed with pillow/blanket. Do danam of same after puja.
azUnyazayana~vratam~1.Shloka:
lakSmyA viyujyatE dEva na kadAcit yatO bhavAn .
tathA kalatrasambandhO dEva mA mE viyujyatAm ..

dUrvA-gaNapati~vratam.Short Description: Perform puja of Ganapati with `dUrvA` grass

garuDa~paJcamI.Short Description:
* Day Garuda brought Amrutam for Nagas
* Day Garuda and Takshaka fought and compromise was struck with Takshaka as garland in Garuda's neck (peace treaty :)

nAga~paJcamI.Short Description: Naga Panchami; SarpaPooja (manasaDevi); Vishnu's boon to AdiSesha that humans will worship on this day
nAga~paJcamI.Shloka:
apasarpa sarpa bhadraM tE dUraM gaccha mahAyazAH .
janamEjayasya yajJAntE astIkavacanaM smaran ..

hayagrIva~jayantI.Short Description: Lord Hayagriva did upadesham of all four vedas to Brahma.
hayagrIva~jayantI.Shloka:
OGkArOdgItharUpAya RgyajussAmamUrtayE.
namO'studEvadEvAya vAcchitArthapradAyinE..
ajJAnatimiraM chindhi jJAnaM ca''zu prayaccha mE.
dEhi mE dEva dEvEza hayazIrSa namO'stu tE..

saMskRta~divasaH.Short Description: World Sanskrit Day is celebrated on this day.

zrI~rAghavEndra-svAmI~ArAdhanA.Shloka:
pujyAya rAghavEndrAya satyadharmaratAya ca.
bhajatAM kalavRkSAya namatAM kAmadhEnavE..

mahAkAlI~jayantI.Short Description: Goddess Mahakali is 1st of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

vRSabha~pUjA.Short Description: Vrushabha puja; Nandi born to Shilaada on this day

lakSmI-varAha~jayantI.Shloka:
jitaM jitaM tE'jita yajJabhAvana trayIM tanuM svAM paridhunvatE namaH.
yadrOmagartESu nililyuraddhayastasmai namaH kAraNasUkarAya tE..3-13-35..
—zrImadbhAgavatE mahApurANE tRtIyEskandhE trayOdazE'dhyAyE

haritAlikA~vratam.Short Description: Puja of Gauri-Maheshwara on Vrishabham, esp. for girls desirous of getting married, like Goddess Parvati sought the hand of Maheshwara, as Himavan's daughter.

sUrya~SaSThI.Short Description: Perform puja of Surya, eat Panchagavya -- brings merits greater than Ashvamedha!
sUrya~SaSThI.Shloka:
zuklE bhAdrapadE SaSThyAM snAnaM bhAskarapUjanam .
 prAzanaM paJcagavyasya azvamEdhaphalAdhikam ..

vitastOtsavam.Short Description: 7 days bath in Vitasta river tributary of Narmada

vAmana~jayantI.Short Description: Wednesday Shravana ; Vamana Jayanti; Shravana Dvadashi; Vijaya Dvadashi; Shakra Dvadashi

bhuvanEzvarI~jayantI.Short Description: Goddess Bhuvaneshwari is 4th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.
bhuvanEzvarI~jayantI.Shloka:
udyadinadyutimindukirITAm tuGgakucAM nayanatrayayuktAM 
smEramukhIM varadAGkuzapAzAbhItikarAm prabhajE bhuvanEzIm

ananta~dvAdazI.Short Description: Vanjuli (Cow giving lots of milk), dugdha (milk), Aviyoga, Ananta Dvadashi

vizvarUpa~yAtrA.Short Description: Shankaracharyas will resume their travel, after being stationed for Chaturmasya vratam for the last four pakshas.

kapila~SaSThI.Shloka:
prabhAkara namastubhyaM saMsArAnmAM samuddhara.
 bhuktimuktipradO yasmAt tasmAcchAntiM prayaccha mE..

jImUtavAhana~pUjA~1.Short Description: Jeemuutavahana is an atma-tyagi vidyadhara Chakravarti. Saved Shankhachuda's (Naaga) life by offering himself to Garuda. From that day Garuda stopped eating snakes.

kaMsa-vadhaH.Short Description: Lord Krishna killed Kamsa on this day; most popularly celebrated in Mathura and Uttar Pradesh.

sumaGgalI~navamI.Short Description: In honour of Sumangalis (in the family), by holding a feast for Suvasinis and Kanyas.
sumaGgalI~navamI.Shloka:
bharturagrE mRtA nArI sahadAhEna vA mRtA .
 tasyAH sthAnE niyuJjIta vipraiH saha suvAsinIm ..

dauhitra~pratipat.Short Description: Grandson must seek blessings of his maternal grandparents, and bestow gifts.

patrikA-pravEza~pUjA.Short Description: Pooja of Kapila cow, eat only Panchagavya, next day eat

mahAnavamI/sarasvatI~pUjA.Short Description:
Daanam is good, get crore times punya.
MaatruNavami, NaamaNavami Vratam, DurgaNavami-Vratam, Shourya-Vratam, Mahaaphala Vratam, PradeeptaNavami

vijayadazamI.Short Description:
Arjuna wins over all Kauravas and Karna
Sri Rama's army built tents on ocean bank before crossing on Shravana star (AnandaRamayanam)
Best day for AksharaaBhyaasam

madhvAcArya~jayantI.Short Description: Jayanti of Madhvacharya, a proponent of Dvaita Vedanta

kO~jAgarti~vratam.Short Description: Have to play Aksha kreeda only on this day and Ko-jagarti-Vratam (Lakshmi will ask "who are awake"). Vaalakhilya Rushi mentioned Ko-jagarti Vratam
kO~jAgarti~vratam.Shloka:
nizIthE varadA lakSmIH kO jAgartIti bhASiNI.
tasmai vittaM prayacchAmi akSaiH krIDAM karOti yaH..

kuntI (pArvatI)~vratam.Short Description: Kunti-vratam done today will remove all paapams (including Gohatya). As per Bhavishyottara Puraana. Here Kunti means Parvati. Also, some people worship Yudhisthira's mother Kunti. In AP/TEL, eldest child is given new clothes, harti and blessed "Deerghayushman".

candrOdaya~umA~vratam.Short Description: Attla-Taddi (Telugu). After moonrise, Uma devi pooja; From this day to Deepaavali eat more Urad dal

dhanvantari~jayantI.Short Description: Dhanvantari Jayanti (born as Divodaas King of Kaashi) as per Brahmanda-Puraana (Dvadashi?)

(yama)~dIpa~trayOdazI.Short Description: Do `dAnaM` of `dIpam`, light deepam outside the house.
(yama)~dIpa~trayOdazI.Shloka:
AzvinasyAsitE pakSE trayOdazyAM nizAmukhE.
yamadIpaM bahirdadyAt apamRtyurvinazyati..

mRtyunA pAzadaNDAbhyAM kAlEna zyAmayA saha.
trayOdazyAM dIpadAnAt sUryajaH prIyatAM mama..

naraka~caturdazI.Short Description:
*ShriKrishna killed Muraasura and Narakaasura on this day.
*Must do Taila-abhyangana-snaanam in early morning before sunrise, else Narakam (as per PadmaPurana) . If done, equal to GangaSnanam and avoids YamaYaatanam. Use water stored from previous day. Previous day night do pooja to water. Use this water on Chaturdashi. With plough uproot Upaamaarga-vruksham (small one) and put in the water. (DO NOT PLUCK WITH HAND). Do dhyaanam of Seeta.
* As per KalikaPuranam, Naraka was also upraised by Janaka. He was then sent to PraajyotishaPuram.

dIpOtsava~caturdazI/yama-tarpaNam.Short Description: Perform Tarpana to Yamadharmaraja (even those with father). `jIvatpitA'pi kurvIta tarpaNaM yamabhISmayoH`

prEta~caturdazI.Short Description: Perform Deepa Danam for Yamadharmaraja in evening

dIpAvalI/lakSmI-kubEra-pUjA.Short Description: Gives light even to Naraka-vasis; Also, Bali was sent to Paatalam on this day.

gOvardhana~pUjA.Short Description: Commemoration of Govardhana Leela of Krishna. Offer naivedyam to Lord Krishna.

sarpa~pUjA~2.Short Description: Vishnu's boon to AdiSesha that humans will worship on this day

Adi~zaGkara mAnasika~sannyAsa-dinam.Short Description: In Plava Nama year Adi Shankara obtained permission from mother and took manasika sanyasam

kArtika~pUrNimA~snAnam.Short Description: Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.

dattAtrEya~jayantI.Shloka:
Adau brahmA madhyE viSNurantE dEvaH sadAzivaH.
mUrtitrayasvarUpAya dattAtrEya namO'stu tE..

zRGgErI 32 jagadguru zrI nRsiMha bhAratI.Shloka:
prahlAdavaradO dEvO yO nRsiMhaH parO hariH.
nRsiMhOpAsakaM nityaM taM nRsiMhaH guruM bhajE..

zRGgErI 34 jagadguru zrI candrazEkhara b.Shloka:
sadA''tmadhyAnanirataM viSayEbhyaH paraGmukham .
naumi zAstrESu niSNAtaM candrazEkharabhAratIm ..

zRGgErI 35 jagadguru zrI abhinava vidyAt.Shloka:
vivEkinaM mahAprAjJyaM dhairyaudAryakSamAnidhim .
sadA'bhinavapUrvaM taM vidyAtIrthaguruM bhajE ..

zRGgErI 34 jagadguru zrI candrazEkhara b.Shloka:
sadA''tmadhyAnanirataM viSayEbhyaH paraGmukham .
naumi zAstrESu niSNAtaM candrazEkharabhAratIm ..

zRGgErI 35 jagadguru zrI abhinava vidyAt.Shloka:
vivEkinaM mahAprAjJyaM dhairyaudAryakSamAnidhim .
sadA'bhinavapUrvaM taM vidyAtIrthaguruM bhajE ..

trailaGga~svAmI~jayantI.Short Description: Paramahamsa described Him as "walking Shiva of Varanasi"

mArgazIrSa~zivaliGga~SaSThI.Short Description: Have darshan of Shivalingam today; removes Shivapachara doshas in the family.
mArgazIrSa~zivaliGga~SaSThI.Shloka:
mArgazIrSE'malE pakSE SaSThyAM vArEM'zumAlinaH .
zatatArAgatE candrE liGgaM syAddRSTigOcaram .

mitra~saptamI.Short Description: Birth of Surya to Aditya-Kashyapa on this day.
mitra~saptamI.Shloka:
adityAM kazyapAjjajJE mitrO nAma divAkaraH.
saptamyAM tEna sA khyAtA lOkE'smin mitrasaptamI..

badaryAM~jyOtirmaTha~pratiSThApana~jayan.Short Description: Adi Shankara founded Jyotir Mutt, Badarinath in Rakshasa year Totakacharya as first

zRGgEryAM~zAradA~maTha~pratiSThApana~jay.Short Description: Adi Shankara founded Sharada Mutt, Shringeri in Pingala year Sureshwaracharya as first

tyAgarAja~ArAdhanA.Shloka:
kAmakrOdhAdirahitaM rAmabhaktazirOmaNim .
tyAgarAjaguruM vandE saGgItAbdhiM kalAnidhim ..

zyAmaLAnavarAtriH~ArambhaH.Short Description: Shyamala Devi specially blesses musicians; honour musicians in this period.

varakunda~caturthI.Shloka:
mAghazuklacaturthyAM tu kundapuSpaiH sadAzivam .
sampUjya yO hi naktA''zI samprApnOti zriyaM naraH ..

sarpa~pUjA.Short Description: Vishnu's boon to AdiSesha that humans will worship on this day.

zrIrAma~vanavAsa~gamanam.Short Description: Afternoon Shri Raama started to go to the forests/exile.

vasanta~zrI~paJcamI.Short Description: Worship Mahavishnu and Mahalakshmi, Rati Devi and Manmatha with jasmine flowers.
vasanta~zrI~paJcamI.Shloka:
mAghamAsE nRpazrESTha zuklAyAM paJcamItithau.
ratikAmau tu sampUjya kartavyaH sumahOtsavaH..

dvArakA~maTha~pratiSThApana~jayantI.Short Description: Adi Shankara founded Dwaraka Mutt in Sadharana year with HastamalakaAcharya as first

bhISmASTamI.Short Description: Bhishma obtained mukti on this day; offer tarpana to Bhishma (even those with parents). Brings health, long life and harmony in family.

tilapadma~dvAdazI/tilOtpatti.Short Description: Mahavishnu created black til by extreme `tapas` on this day; light til deepam and offer `tilAnnam naivedyam`.
tilapadma~dvAdazI/tilOtpatti.Shloka:
mAghE tu zukladvAdazyAM yatO hi bhagavAn pura.
tilAn utpAdayAmAsa tapaH kRtvA sudAruNam ..
tilatailEna dIpAzcha dEyAh dEva gRhESu ca.
nivEdayEt tilAnEva

lalitA~jayantI.Short Description: Goddess Lalita is 3rd of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

mAgha~pUrNimA~snAnam.Short Description: Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.

hOli.Short Description: Festival of colours is celebrated today.

ta:ADi~kiruttikai.Short Description: Special puja for Subrahmanya Swami in temples.

ta:vaikAci~vizAkham.Short Description: Special puja for Subrahmanya Swami in temples. Birth of Subrahmanya Swami. Worship Him with red flowers.

ta:tiruvADippUram.Shloka:
zrIviSNucitta-kulakalpakanandavallIm
zrIraGgarAja-hari-candana-yOga-drzyAm .
sAkSAt kSamAM karuNayA kamalAmivAnyAM
gOdAm ananyazaraNaH zaraNaM prapadyE..

ta:ArudrA~darican2am/naTarAjar mahAbhiSE.Short Description: Visit Chidambaram to have darshan of Nataraja, or pray to Nataraja
ta:ArudrA~darican2am/naTarAjar mahAbhiSE.Shloka:
kRpAsamudram sumukhaM trinEtraM sadAzivaM rudramanantarUpam .
jaTAdharaM pArvativAmabhAgaM cidambarEzaM hRdi bhAvayAmi ..

pUntAnaM~jayantI.Short Description: Poonthanam, a great devotee of Guruvayurappan, enriched Malayalam devotional literature with his renowned poetic composition 'Jnanapana', a philosophical work of all times. On this day, recital of Poonthanam's works and debate takes place. A one week literary festival is conducted at Poonthanam illam.

zrI~zESAdri~svAmI~jayantI.Shloka:
karuNAsAgaraM zAntam aruNAcalavAsinam .
zrIzESAdriguruM vandE brahmIbhUtaM tapOnidhim ..

zrI~zESAdri~svAmI~ArAdhanA.Shloka:
karuNAsAgaraM zAntam aruNAcalavAsinam .
zrIzESAdriguruM vandE brahmIbhUtaM tapOnidhim ..

ta:mayilai~veLLIzvarar~brahmOtsavam.Short Description: Enactment of restoration of eyesight of Shukracharya.

kRttikA~maNDala~pArAyaNam.Short Description: Conduct veda parayanam in the evening, on one of these 48 days.

ta:undu~madakkaLir2r2an2{}.Short Description: Offer naivedyam of `citrAnnam` (tamarind rice) to Vishnu

ta:kUDAravallI.Short Description: Offer naivedyam of `gudAnnam` to Vishnu, as mentioned in the Tiruppavai 27

nArAyaNIyaM-jayantI.Short Description: Celebration of completion of Narayaniyam (762 CE), in Guruvayur temple.

ta:kar2avaigaL pin2cen2r2u.Short Description: Offer naivedyam of `dadhyodanam` to Vishnu, for Tiruppavai 28

makara~jyOti.Short Description: Darshan of Makara Jyoti in Sabarimala Ayyappa Temple.

SaDazIti~mithunaravi.Short Description: Perform danam of clothes, food and water.

viSNupadI~siMharavi.Short Description: Perform danam of ghee, milk vessel, "ghee cow" and fruits.
viSNupadI~siMharavi.Shloka:
ghRtaM ca kSIrakumbhazca ghRtadhEnu phalAni ca.
zrAvaNE zrIdharaprItyai dAtavyAni vipazcitA..

SaDazIti~kanyAravi.Short Description: Perform danam of clothes/place to live.

tulA-viSu~puNyakAlam.Short Description: Perform danam of rice/wheat/grains and cow ghee/curd etc.

SaDazIti~dhanurravi.Short Description: Perform danam of clothes/vehicle (e.g. bullock cart).

viSNupadI~kumbharavi.Short Description: Perform danam of hay, grass, food and pure water to cows.
viSNupadI~kumbharavi.Shloka: kumbhapravEzE dAnaM tu gavaM ambu tRNasya ca

dvAdaza~saptamI.Short Description: Surya Puja, Danam to please Surya Bhagavan

dAmOdara~dvAdazI.Short Description: Perform Vishnu Pratima Danam, Sridhara Puja

nArikEla~pUrNimA.Short Description: Offer coconut to sea God Varuna

bhAnusaptamI.Short Description: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya.
bhAnusaptamI.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

bhAnusaptamI*.Short Description: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya. Today is even more auspicious, as it is associated with `revatI` star.
bhAnusaptamI*.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

budhASTamI.Short Description: `aSTamI tithi` on a Wednesday is as sacred as a solar eclipse.
budhASTamI.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

aGgAraka~caturthI.Short Description: `caturthI tithi` on a Tuesday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Good day for doing puja of Ganesha/Subrahmanya with naivedyam of modakam/millet flour respectively.
aGgAraka~caturthI.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

kRSNAGgAraka-caturdazI~puNyakAlam/yamata.Short Description: `kRSNa caturdazI tithi` on a Tuesday is very sacred. Perform `tarpaNa` to Yama Dharamaraja.

sOma~amAvasyA.Short Description: `amAvasyA` on a Monday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for performing pradakshinam of Pippala tree.
sOma~amAvasyA.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH.. mUlatO brahmarUpAya madhyatO viSNurUpiNE.
agrataH zivarUpAya vRkSarAjAya tE namaH..
akSispandaM bhujaspandaM duHsvapnaM durvicintanam .
 zatrUnAm ca samutpannam azvattha zamayasva mE ..

candra-darzanam.Short Description: Have darshan of Moon today, chanting the following shloka
candra-darzanam.Shloka:
zvEtAmbaraH zvEtavibhUSaNazca zvEtadyutirdaNDadharO dvibAhuH.
candrO'mRtAtmA varadaH kirITI mayi prasAdaM vidadhAtu dEvaH..

ajA~EkAdazI.Short Description: Satya Harishchandra performed this to get back family and kingdom.

indirA~EkAdazI.Short Description: Indrasena's son did Ekadashi and as a result he was shifted from hell to heaven.

zayana~EkAdazI.Shloka:
vAsudEva jagadyOnE prAptEyaM dvAdazI tava.
bhujaGgazayanE'bdhau ca sukhaM svapihi mAdhava..
iyaM tu dvAdazI dEva zayanArthaM vinirmita .
asyAM suptE jagannAthE jagatsuptaM bhavEdidam ..
vibuddhE tvayi buddhyEta sarvamEtaccarAcaram ..

parivartinI~EkAdazI.Short Description: Side ways turn inside sleep of Vishnu midway after Shayana Ekadashi.
parivartinI~EkAdazI.Shloka:
vAsudEva jagannAtha prAptEyaM dvAdazI tava.
 pArzvEna parivartasva sukhaM svapihi mAdhava..

saGkaTahara-caturthI~vratam.Short Description: Special vrata day for Ganesha. Fast during the day and pray to Ganesha after moonrise, as follows:
saGkaTahara-caturthI~vratam.Shloka:
gaNAdhipastvaM dEvEza caturthyAM pUjitO mayA.
kaSTAn mAM mOcayEzAna sarvamiSTaM ca dEhi mE..

vijayA~bhAnusaptamI.Short Description: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya. When `zukla saptamI` is present at sunrise, it is called `vijayA`.
vijayA~bhAnusaptamI.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

vijayA~bhAnusaptamI*.Short Description: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya. When `zukla saptamI` is present at sunrise, it is called `vijayA`.
vijayA~bhAnusaptamI*.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

bhaumAzvinI~puNyakAlam.Short Description: When Ashwini nakshatram falls on a Tuesday, it is a special `puNyakAlam`. Do `upAsanA` of Lakshmi Narasimha.

budhAnUrAdhA~puNyakAlam.Short Description: When Anuradha nakshatram falls on a Wednesday, it is a special `puNyakAlam` for performing danams. One can do dAnaM of dadhyodanam in Vishnu temples on this day.

ta:mAci~cevvAy.Short Description: Do `upavAsam` (at least do not take salt) and pray to Lord Shiva (Vaidyanatha Swami).

ta:puraTTAci can2ikkizhamai.Short Description: Perform special puja and naivedyam (e.g. `tilAnnam`) to Lord Venkateshwara.

vaizAkha-snAnapUrtiH.Shloka:
mAdhavE mESagE bhAnau murArE madhusUdana.
prAtaH snAnEna mE nAtha phaladO bhava pApahan ..

satyanArAyaNa~jayantI.Short Description: Satyanarayana Swami Jayanti is celebrated in Annavaram Satya Narayana Temple, Andhra Pradesh

bagalAmukhI~jayantI.Short Description: Goddess Bagalamukhi is 8th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

dhUmAvatI~jayantI.Short Description: Goddess Dhumavati is 7th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

chinnamastA~jayantI.Short Description: Goddess Chinnmasta is 6th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

tripura~bhairavI~jayantI.Short Description: Goddess Tripura Bhairavi is 5th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

mahAtArA~jayantI.Short Description: Goddess Mahatara is 2nd of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

kamalA~jayantI.Short Description: Goddess Kamala is 10th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

*cUDAmaNi~candra-grahaNam.Short Description: When a lunar eclipse occurs on a Monday, it is even more special: `cUDAmaNi`, i.e. crest jewel.

*cUDAmaNi~sUrya-grahaNam.Short Description: When a solar eclipse occurs on a Sunday, it is even more special: `cUDAmaNi`, i.e. crest jewel.

AyuSmAn-bava-saumya.Short Description: A rare combination of `AyuSmAn yOga, bava karaNa` and `saumyavAsara`. Also a source of the normal blessing 'AyuSmAn bava saumya'!

jayantI~mahAdvAdazI.Short Description: Dvadashi tithi, combined with Punarvasu nakshatram.

jayA~mahAdvAdazI.Short Description: Dvadashi tithi, combined with Pushya nakshatram.

mahAjayA~saptamI.Short Description: Saptami tithi, combined with a sankranti.

mahOdaya~puNyakAlam.Short Description: A rare combination of Pausha masam, Shravana nakshatram, Vyatipata yogam and Monday.

ardhOdaya~puNyakAlam.Short Description: A rare combination of Pausha masam, Shravana nakshatram, Vyatipata yogam and Sunday.

pApanAzinI~mahAdvAdazI.Short Description: Dvadashi tithi, combined with Rohini nakshatram.

vAruNI~trayOdazI.Short Description: Phalguna Krishna Chaturdashi, combined with Shatabhishak Nakshatram.

mahAvAruNI~trayOdazI.Short Description: Phalguna Krishna Chaturdashi, combined with Shatabhishak Nakshatram and Saturday.

mahAmahAvAruNI~trayOdazI.Short Description: Phalguna Krishna Chaturdashi, combined with Shatabhishak Nakshatram, Saturday and Shubha Yogam.

vijayA/zravaNa~mahAdvAdazI.Short Description: Dvadashi tithi, combined with Shravana nakshatram.
